column2: If the Pope owns Roma, this window will fill with its glass and Catholicism will get several minor bonuses
If the Celtic Patriarch owns Mellifont, this window will fill with its glass and Catholicism will get several minor bonuses
If the Iberian Patriarch owns Fatima, this window will fill with its glass and Catholicism will get several minor bonuses
This is your current §Y[Root.GetCurrency]§! with the §YCatholic Patriarchs§!!
[Root.GetCurrency] can be gained by giving relics, being a member of a favoured rite or being pious, and can be used to gain a variety of boons.
Seize the relics of the Church under the authority of the Anti-pope
With 3 of the holy sites under my control and my own substantial piety, the false Pope in Rome is forced ro accept the truth of my Pope
Seize the assets of the Church under the authority of the Anti-pope
Request that the Pope appoint your dynasty member as the new Celtic Patriarch
Request that the Pope appoint your dynasty member as the new Iberian Patriarch
Request that the Pope appoint your dynasty member as the new Byzantine Patriarch
Request that the Pope appoint your dynasty member as the new Eastern Patriarch
Now that my capital is in Europe, it makes no sense for me to remain a member of a branch from Catholicism when the Holy Father is on my doorstep.
The Vatican has dispatched the requested Swiss Guard Commander to your court, the Holy Father hopes you use him well.
The Vatican has dispatched the requested Priest to your court, the Holy Father hopes you use him well.
The Vatican has dispatched the requested Monetary Gift to your court, the Holy Father hopes you use it well.
The Vatican has dispatched a detachment of Swiss Guard to your capital, the Holy Father hopes you use them well.
Your court priest has been appointed a cardinal at direct request of the Holy Father.
Your request to go to war in the name of God has been endorsed by the Holy Father.
The Vatican has dispatched the requested relic to your court, the Holy Father hopes you use it well.
The Vatican has appointed your relative as the new Patriarch, the Holy Father hopes he remains righteous in his duties.
The new Pope thanks you for assisting him in his rise to the Holy See.
You have seized the assets of the Church within your realm under the authority of the Anti-Pope.
You have seized the relics of the Church within your realm under the authority of the Anti-Pope.
My liege, the Order of Saint Lazarus - the Knights Hospitaller - stands ready to serve you in defense of Christianity and the Holy Land! Pax Christi,\n\nGrand Master [From.GetFirstName]
Vassalize the Knights of Saint Lazarus
As a favoured Catholic Monarch, it is within my power to vassalize the powerful Knights of Saint Lazarus at the cost of 500 gold and much devotion.
If the Byzantine Patriarch owns Haghia Sophia, this window will fill with its glass and Catholicism will get several minor bonuses
If the Eastern Patriarch owns Jerusalem, this window will fill with its glass and Catholicism will get several minor bonuses
§Y[This.GetTitledName]§! will leave [This.GetHerHis] current life behind and make a new one for [This.GetHerselfHimself] in Rome.\n
left their old life behind to travel to Rome
left their old life behind to travel to Rome, on the order of $KILLER$
Restore the Celtic Patriarch to Dublin
Restore the Iberian Patriarch to Lisbon
Restore the Byzantine Patriarch to Constantinople
Restore the Eastern Patriarch to Jerusalem
A sword comissioned and granted directly by the Holy Father himself
A Suit of armour comissioned and granted directly by the Holy Father himself
Request the Pope to sanction a holy war sooner than would usually be permitted
Request a gift of a relic or artifact from the Holy Father
Send a donation to the church
Send a donation to the church
Appoint your Court Priest as a Cardinal
Request Swiss Guard Detachment be dispatched to assist you in your wars
Request a Swiss Guard Commander to lead your Armies
Request a Monetary Gift from the holy father to develop your realm
Request a priest trained in the Vatican
Send Artifact for the Vatican Museum
Send Artifact for the Vatican Museum
If the §YPapacy§! is amenable to foreign relations you can send an envoy to provide the Papacy with a token of your piety. Donating will increase your §YDevotion§!.

If the §YPapacy§! is amenable to foreign relations, and you have not yet had your appeals heard in the past year, you can send an envoy to request any one of a variety of blessings the Papacy might deem you worthy of. Asking for gifts costs §YDevotion§!.
